text:
I appreciate you all. :pray:

I’ll add Airtable. It gets overpriced on a per user basis but being able to visualize our content workflow as projects moved through a pipeline was a real turning point in being able to understand when we were ahead or behind schedule.

And Google Draw was our secret weapon for doing design reviews - editor drops graphic requests onto a blank slide, designer drops assets onto next slide, and graphics reviewer for that project leaves comments and feedback on them.

elements.text:
